text: of Bridge Zone Earth's Stellar Activations. • Those who do not V oyage will evolve within a more enlightened Earth culture, in which new forms of free energy & Keylontic science applications are discovered. • Perceptually, Bridging Humans will experience a sense of less weight within the atmosphere & their physical bodies & the body will have a renewed sense of energy, health & vitality.
